page.title: 05Education Continued.
page.content:
Petitor Down is an important educational resource for the children at St. Marychurch Primary School.On Wednesdays the children of class 2 have explored the down.This is what they have found:_
Paul :_ Every Wednesday Class 2 visit Petitor Downs we have seen some blue tits and some robins and sparrows and seagulls and some butterflies.
Sharon:_ We have seen a ladybird and a butterfly we made a picture and we made a nature diary.
Komron:_ We have seen blossom and the blossom has changed.
